description: Run Linux On Android Without Root Access This application will allow you to run Linux on Android, by using https://f-droid.org/packages/com.termux and PRoot technology, you can even run SSH and Xfce4 Desktop Environment!!! Features: * NO ROOT ACCESS REQUIRED!!! * Lots of Linux distros supported: 1. Ubuntu 2. Debian 3. Kali 4. Parrot Security OS 5. Fedora 6. CentOS 7. openSUSE Leap 8. openSUSE Tumberweed 9. Arch Linux 10. Black Arch * Xfce4, Mate, LXQt, LXDE Desktop Environment Supported * Install multiple distros without conflict * Provide uninstallation script to fully uninstall distro Note: * This app requires https://f-droid.org/packages/com.termux to work, please install it * About device requirements: Android Version: At least Android Lollipop; Architecture: armv7, arm64, x86, x86_64 * For any suggestion or issue, please open an issue on Github.
